Name: team_size_constraint
Description: Team size must be between 5 and 9 members

Name: project_status_active
Description: Constraint applies only to active projects

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: Sprint duration must be exactly 2 weeks (14 days)

Name: story_points_positive
Description: Story points for a User Story must be a positive integer

Name: task_effort_positive
Description: Effort for a task must be greater than 0

Name: budget_non_negative
Description: Project budget must not be negative

Name: worker_availability_range
Description: Worker availability must be between 0 and 1

Name: blocker_severity_range
Description: Blocker severity must be on a scale from 1 (Low) to 5 (Critical)

Name: feature_priority_range
Description: Feature priority must be on a scale from 1 (Low) to 10 (Critical)

Name: sprint_goal_achievement_binary
Description: Sprint goal achievement status is a boolean (0/1)
